other_tests.procedure_name: endoscopic ultrasound with fine needle aspiration
CT ABDOMEN WITH AND WITHOUT CONTRAST
other_tests.findings: In the pancreatic head, there is a large heterogeneously lesion, with cystic components and internal calcification, measuring up to 4.4 x 4.1 x 4.3 cm, unchanged in appearance compared to the study two days ago.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Essentially unchanged in appearance compared to the study two days ago.
